chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
si: sorted_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface

Goal:
raft_net_invariant_reboot' client_cache_correct

Premises:
raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_reboot
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record log_matching_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_matching_interface { log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_matching net } Arguments log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st'); handleClientRequest_logs_sorted : forall (h : name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (
client_cache_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output), getLastId (nwState net h) client = Some (id, out) -> output_correct client id out (rev (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments client_cache_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record state_machine_safety_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_state_machine_safety_interface { state_machine_safety_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_safety net } Arguments state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record max_index_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_max_index_sanity_interface { max_index_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity net } Arguments max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_reboot' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_reboot' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
state_machine_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => state_machine_log net /\ client_cache_correct net /\ client_cache_complete net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments state_machine_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant' : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), raft_net_invariant_init P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request' P -> raft_net_invariant_timeout' P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries' P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote' P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' P -> raft_net_invariant_do_leader' P -> raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' P -> raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> raft_net_invariant_reboot' P -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net

logs_sorted_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, sorted (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => logs_sorted_host net /\ logs_sorted_nw net /\ packets_gt_prevIndex net /\ packets_ge_prevTerm net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

state_machine_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, stateMachine (nwState net h) = snd (execute_log (deduplicate_log (rev (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h)))))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments state_machine_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type]

logs_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n prevT prevI entries c -> sorted entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface |- Type]

raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

RaftNetHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => let (state0, pkts) := handleMessage src me m state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> name -> msg -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftNetHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
applyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => let (out, d) := handler (eInput e) (stateMachine st) in ([out], RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st (assoc_set clientId_eq_dec (clientCache st) (eClient e) (eId e, out))) d) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments applyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list entry -> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> (forall h' : Net.name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

raft_net_invariant_client_request' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> (forall h' : Net.name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

doGenericServer_spec : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ps) -> st' = st \/ log st' = log st /\ lastApplied st < lastApplied st' /\ lastApplied st' = commitIndex st /\ (exists (os' : list raft_output) (st'' : raft_data), applyEntries h st (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied st <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex st)) (findGtIndex (log st) (lastApplied st)))) = (os', st'') /\ clientCache st' = clientCache st'' /\ (forall c : clientId, getLastId st' c = getLastId st'' c))

```coq
intros orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params P net net' d h d' H_reboot H_P H_reachable H_state H_packets H_net'.
apply (H_P net).
- exact H_state.
- exact H_reachable.
- intros h'.
  rewrite <- H_state.
  apply update_neq.
  unfold not. intros H_eq. discriminate H_eq.
- exact H_packets.
```
